name: super-luck

effect.sun-moon: This Pokémon's moves have critical hit rates one stage higher than normal.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon's moves have critical hit rates one stage higher than normal.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon's moves have critical hit rates one stage higher than normal.

short_effect: Raises moves' critical hit rates one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
